X-ray powder diffraction (XRPD) was used in order to confirm carbamazepine (CBZ) to be carbamazepine dihydrate (CBZD). In order to achieve this, the experimentally obtained XRPD diffractogram of CBZD was compared with the calculated diffractogram (CBZD, FEFNOT02, monoclinic, P21/c)
69 from the Cambridge Structural Database (CSD).
